website_summaries.verdict: Formula with the nutrient add-ins that make it a good choice for parents looking for a basic breast milk substitute.
pros: Ingredient combination makes this formula nutritionally power-packed for babies

customer_reviews.title: This stuff does a good job of keeping your baby alive and growing
customer_reviews.text: Dad Review: This stuff does a good job of keeping your baby alive and growing. She smiles too and her brain works. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P. Stango

customer_reviews.title: Enfamil is great
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Similac to Enfamil. My daughter likes it much better. It's closer to breast milk & I do half formula, half breast milk once she got to 6 months before that it was just BM.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Awesome formula, awesome company
customer_reviews.text: Very well-balanced nutrition, very few tummy issues (to be expected from a newly developing digestive tract). I used this to supplement my breast feeding as my milk couldn't keep up, and also to make sure baby got proper nutrition. Baby is now 18 months, is and has been incredibly healthy and developing well. I attribute most of that to this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not non-gmo, wrong picture being advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this happened with us. We did not receive non-gmo forumla. I was excited to see they were selling non-gmo refill pack but we received wrong one. Either the picture is being advertised wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: One of the boxes was a little out of shape, but that happens sometimes. I'm still giving it a five since I throw out the box anyways. I used the beaten up box first and the bags inside were sealed and closed. They expire until late next year. I'm satisfied with my purchase and got them on sale!! It was a very great deal! I would purchase again, especially at sale price!
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Good, but pricy
customer_reviews.text: I think Enfamil dissolves slightly better than Simulac. Our baby responds equally to both. Price is a bit higher though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: This box comes with two refills. I usually buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This box comes with two refills. I usually buy my son's formula at my grocery store and one refill is about $28. Saves me a lot of money, I think I'll start buying his formula on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Bobuns703

customer_reviews.title: Standard formula, works well. Price is comparable to buying at Wal-mart.
customer_reviews.text: Standard formula, works well. Price is comparable to buying at Wal-mart, unless you have a manufacturer's coupon or a discount card to use in store. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: see above
customer_reviews.text: we ordered this product to help our son and daughter in law with their newborn twins at the time of their move to our city.As a retired MD I'm quite familiar with Enfamil....
customer_reviews.author: retired doc

customer_reviews.title: Best Formula in the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula. My older one started on formula when she was 6 months old. She did not like similac or other brands because of the strong smell they have but when i gave her enfamil she took to it very easily. It did give her a bit of gas but not as bad as other similac children i have seen in my friends circle. With my second one i didnot have to research. It was enfamil all the way without doubt and she loves it....:-). It has also helped me build healthier, happier kids.....cheers!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: ... switched from a different brand (Novalac) and my daughter liked it right away
customer_reviews.text: We switched from a different brand (Novalac) and my daughter liked it right away. She didn't have any stomach problems nor burping.
customer_reviews.author: Dejan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way I purchase my son's formula. The packaging makes it economical. It doesn't completely fill up the refillable 22oz container but it's better price wise to go with this option. They do provide you with new scoops in each of these packages too so that you can replace the one you've been using.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F Siedsma

customer_reviews.title: I would recomnend.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old has had this since birth. Very nutritional and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Janay R.

customer_reviews.title: Enfamil products are great!
customer_reviews.text: Suggested by my pediatrician, this was the second product in the Enfamil line that I tried. I am leaning toward gentleease, but, this is still a good formula.
customer_reviews.author: Fab and 40ish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Standard purchase, arrived quickly, "best by:" date really far off, so it's fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 months old son drinks Enfamil only and we never have a issues, but with exactly this product he have diarrhea! I didn't made the connection and thought that he simply cached something from outside, but after I fed some ready to use formula Enfamil, he was OK. Because I didn't made the connection with this prouder, after a couple of days I opened the second load and fed some to my son - DIARRHEA THE SAME DAY! something is wrong. Otherwise the formula looks OK. I bought from another vendor Enfamil prouder in the past and my son didn't have problems. Amazon should check this product!
customer_reviews.author: Velichka

customer_reviews.title: Works for us.
customer_reviews.text: Formula is tricky, as it isn't the same for every baby and every family. It took us a long time going through other brands before the doctor recommended this one. We love it. My daughter stopped having stomach aches and lost her colic once we changed to Enfamil.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyCross

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing formula from Amazon for a couple of weeks now, and it has been everything I have needed/expected. The price is competitive for the area I live in, and it is shipped right to me so I don't need to worry about running out. Very helpful when you have a baby to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: So I feel very comfortable giving my daughter Enfamil
customer_reviews.text: My pediatrician said she only suggests Enfamil or Similac since the generic brands do not have to reveal every ingredient they use. So I feel very comfortable giving my daughter Enfamil. I love buying this box so we have two packets of powder to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sam N Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by DR
customer_reviews.text: my doctor recommended this. Price was better on here than in stores. We purchased an airtight container to keep the powder in rather than using the original plastic container that kept breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Blackace04

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Great prices for three bags!! Wish Enfamil would make a refill box for 'Reguline'. I HATE all the waste with the plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: toocrazyy21

customer_reviews.title: my baby is happy and healthy using this formula
customer_reviews.text: my baby is happy and healthy using this formula. I couldn't breast feed and she took to enamel no problem.
customer_reviews.author: colleen mccoole

customer_reviews.title: Same as stores, but guaranteed to have in stock :)
customer_reviews.text: For all those that ask, mine were at least 1 year and 5months out to best buy date. I.e. received in May, best buy date is October 2016
customer_reviews.author: dede

customer_reviews.title: Good product - handling not so good
customer_reviews.text: We usually order this from Amazon and it's usually ok, but this is how it was delivered yesterday. I had to make sure that the product itself is fine, which is the case... Since we needed this pretty urgent i will keep it, otherwise I would have send it back ...
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: the milk looks wet, it's normal or there is ...
customer_reviews.text: the milk looks wet, it's normal or there is some problem. I hope somebody who have brought it previously can give me advise.
customer_reviews.author: linqingnan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for our baby from newborn stage till one year of age and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the convenience and price makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new mom, the convenience and price makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: The powder refills are more economical than the pre-made bottles and the powder tubs. As for the formula, my son takes it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fed our baby!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an infant nutritionist, but our pediatrician likes Enfamil. Personally our baby likes the Gentelease (less gassy) version of Enfamil, but this kind is cheaper and baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: JR-azon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this formula. Never had colic from it and started at 1 month old.
customer_reviews.author: kirtbh

customer_reviews.title: Great price and formula!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, price is very reasonable. Only issue is if you add it to hot water, it tends to clump. As long as you add it to lukewarm or chilled water and shake vigorously, you won't have any problem. Used Similac before this, baby was always constipated. Switched to enfamil and will never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I'm very upset with this formula
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving this product 3 stars is because delivery was fast, other then that the quality of formula different then the one they sell in babiesrus and my 5 month daughter had allergy from this formula not recommending this product
customer_reviews.author: Elmar Abbasov

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: This is the formula my friend uses. After a nice visit with her new baby I sent a box. Baby formula is expensive so any way that you can save some money is great.
customer_reviews.author: gmommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I always stand by Enfamil. This was by far the easiest on my baby's tummy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great Formula...
customer_reviews.text: I used Enfamil for my first child, after trying maaaannnnyyy of them, and it was already the best formula I had back then. So i didn't even think twice for my newborn, I went straight to Enfamil, easy transition from Breast milk to formula; easy to digest and seem consistent enough that my baby is not starving after 3-4 hours. I would highly recommend it.. On the - side, it takes forever for this product to ship! Order at least 2 weeks ahead if you don t want to run out of formula..
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend Enfamil to all mums
customer_reviews.text: My baby had been having rashes and eczema that wouldn't go away. After being diagnosed as allergic to milk and eggs I switched his formula milk to Enfamil and I saw changes in his skin within days of using this formula. I would never have used any other formula milk on my baby had I known earlier about Enfamil. I will definitely recommend Enfamil to all mum's.
customer_reviews.author: Abieyuwa Irabor

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Healthy Happy Baby
customer_reviews.text: We had to start supplementing with formula right from the beginning. Started with Enfamil Newborn. Full formula at 6 weeks. Switched to Enfamil Infant at about 3 months. Our son is 9 months and has been very healthy, even after being around other sick children. He started as a very small baby and is now caught up in size. Can't judge against other formula, but it certainly has done very well by us.
customer_reviews.author: Mbot

customer_reviews.title: Quick!
customer_reviews.text: I expected the formula to take a few days to get here. However I received it the next day! I will be ordering it from here from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: Great price on Amazon, especially with $2 grocery coupon!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find Enfamil for cheap in-stores. Coupons galore for Similac out there but not so much for Enfamil. I love stocking up when Amazon has a sale + coupon.
customer_reviews.author: MommyNg

customer_reviews.title: sons loves it
customer_reviews.text: 2 pouches and easy to open. my son has been using it for almost a year now and no issues with this formula.
customer_reviews.author: cez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: received in a timely manner and was pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HEALTH ISSUE
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS LIKE FAKE FORMULA. MY BABY HAD PROBLEMS AFTER THIS FORMULA AND WE STOP (USING) GIVING THIS FORMULA. WE USE TO BOUGHT (SAME BRAND) FROM LOCAL SHOP RITE AND HAD NO PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our son this formula since he was born - he was a C-section and there were other complications with breastfeeding - and he loves it. He is over 7 months old and growing like crazy. We would have preferred to breastfeed but this is definitely the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric DiPier

customer_reviews.title: Enfamil's the way to go
customer_reviews.text: We've always been an Enfamil family, but now Amazon has made it to where we don't have to go out to the store each month to get it, Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal here in comparison to other retailers
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 boxes every 3 days and no problems whatsoever. Best deal here in comparison to other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Rac.diam

customer_reviews.title: Convenient baby food order
customer_reviews.text: Easy, convenient, and would order again. The food was packaged tightly and the price was a good deal. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Newbie

customer_reviews.title: I like it best,and it meets my need perfectly.Its packaging was in good condition and transit was in time. I satisfy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it best,and it meets my need perfectly.Its packaging was in good condition and transit was in time. I satisfy with it. The quality of the product is better than that of other similar products.My granddaughter likes drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: WuNengzhang

customer_reviews.title: Loved It
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than buying the small cans of formula. It gives you more milk and its cheaper than the small cans. My baby downs it fast so this was a better choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Best experience ever!
customer_reviews.text: This formula is great for my twins and I am obviously in search of a bargain since I am buying double. I have not found a better price anywhere and I love the fast 2 day shipping with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Different Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Enfamil has changed their packaging (the ingredients are the same), which seems to make the powder 'settle' more in the bag and we therefore seem to go through it faster. I've tried to 'sift' it to make it more like it was originally to no avail. I would also like the option to purchase a bulk option or one that comes with more than just two packages in it, but it doesn't appear that Enfamil makes those anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hempel

customer_reviews.title: Enfamil PREMIUM Infant Formula Milk-Based with Iron
customer_reviews.text: i prepare it for my baby~I think it's valuable and it is not too sugary for a baby,it's best for my little baby
customer_reviews.author: Rick Shi

customer_reviews.title: Good and safe milk powder for infant baby
customer_reviews.text: it's good for my little baby,it need it more than 500g powder every week,first of all,it's safe food from U.S. amazon.
customer_reviews.author: risingxu

customer_reviews.title: Skin Irritation
customer_reviews.text: I liked its look and the convenience of it but when my little one actually took this using a sippy he's got severe skin irritation that would completely go away in about 4 hours. Here are some photos of my little one having rashes and little bumps after taking this product. I wouldn't recommend this product to babies that are sensitive to formulas.
customer_reviews.author: Khan Jang

customer_reviews.title: Enfamil Premium Infant Formula Refill Box, For Babies 0-12 Months
customer_reviews.text: Enfamil Premium Infant Formula Refill Box, For Babies 0-12 Months,very good,i love it.Enfamil Premium Infant Formula Powder,Enfamil Premium Infant Formula Powder
customer_reviews.author: Wudonghua

customer_reviews.title: My baby and i like
customer_reviews.text: i like Enfagrow Toddler Transitions, 21 Ounce Powder for toddlers 9-18 months. My baby like it very much. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: haiong

customer_reviews.title: Formula
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful! I have bought a lot of things from Amazon.com and have always appreciated the super saver shipping! It was nice to have the formula delivered to my doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: nmugrad97

customer_reviews.title: We used this with my first child and are now using it again with my second. It is the best out there. I highly recommend this fo
customer_reviews.text: We used this with my first child and are now using it again with my second. It is the best out there. I highly recommend this formula.
customer_reviews.author: ajiang2508

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this formula with both of my boys. No problems at all. I only wish they still sold the packs with 3 refills and a refill box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and well packed
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it. And, well, it taste good. Going to purchase more later at the same discount price. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is good for my little boy, he eat & growth very well. It is good one I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product from this seller. Arrived very quick, all sealed & exactly what I was looking for. The price was good & got free shipping. Formula is expensive so wager you get any price break it really helps the final budget.
customer_reviews.author: TSeager1990

customer_reviews.title: Great formula
customer_reviews.text: This formula worked well for our son as he turned 4 months old. It was a great purchase at $35!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pierce

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a formula that I could easily buy at my local grocery store that didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a formula that I could easily buy at my local grocery store that didn't have high fructose corn syrup as one of the main ingredients. This was the best retail option considering that the organic stuff is hard to find and a lot more costly. My daughter has never had any stomach upset, gas, bloating, etc.
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Shame on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine, in and of itself. The problem is that Amazon, who used to ship this by sticking it in a proper box, is now just slapping postage on the Enfamil box and sending it out. This is awful. The bottom of the box always arrives half open, with the bags of formula exposed. I don't know about you, but I for one don't want people to be able to tamper with my baby's food. I used to order this product all the time. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Francois A. Babin

customer_reviews.title: Baby Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has always loved this product and gulps it down every time it's given to her. She's never had any digestive issues with it. As of 6/22/11, Target sells it for $1.00 less, w/ free shipping if you buy 2.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it...
customer_reviews.text: BUT once I read the ingredients in more detail, I stopped buying it!
customer_reviews.author: NCMom

customer_reviews.title: Formula for this pack is very different with 22. ...
customer_reviews.text: Formula for this pack is very different with 22.2oz pack... I don't know why. Formula in 33.2 oz pack is wetter than in 22.2 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 33.2 oz formula box but received a 22.2 oz formula can that was cracked and not sealed. Unreal that I paid for the refill box and got a smaller box. Not to mention the fact that the can came unsealed. Unacceptable shipment!!!!!!!! Very disappointed!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lauren newman

customer_reviews.title: I feel bad I give my son this crap but not bad ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel bad I give my son this crap but not bad enough that I want to whip the pump back out and ready whattoexpect forums about how Their embryo talked in the womb at 3 days postconception.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than other brands...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly dont feel any one baby formula brand is significantly better than another. With that being said, my baby responded much better to the Enfamil Infant than the Similac equivalent. In fact, we even tried the "Gas and Fusiness" Similac and it made him MORE gassy. After a couple days on Enfamil he was MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: IPA Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This option is great since you don't accumulate the formula tubs. Also turns out cheaper than the tub cost of 25-27$
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very upset was thrown over my fence into my backyard
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: What a terrible shopping!
customer_reviews.text: What a terrible shopping!! I bought two boxes and one was opened by someone before. Both boxes are abused. It's really horrible. Is this a kind of 'special' attitude toward customer? Hope no one will meet this situation again!!!
customer_reviews.author: xin

customer_reviews.title: Works great at first, but...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in late July, it's October 1 and they are not working. They worked great the first few weeks, then started getting a message each time I plugged in that the charging device may not work properly. In some cases it works but needs to be jiggled to hold a charge. You wonder comparing price of these cables to those sold by Apple if it's too good to be true and that seems to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Hill

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this !
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this product 0 star I would. Don't buy it ! You can't return it . It leaves black stains on your hand from the fake leather; it's not made well and very bulky. Waist of money. Don't make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Celi

customer_reviews.title: My baby has been off and on this formula for ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby has been off and on this formula for few months. No issues on it. We tried the Enspire and he had more frequent BMs (not diarrhea) including during the night which was a problem as he would perk up when i did the diaper change (in the dark). We switched back to this one a week ago, and no more BMs during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Miroslava Pavlova

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: LO likes Gerber most. Then Kirkland. Enfamil and Similac are third. But LO (Little One) doesn't like the cheap brands that make her gassy or give her tummy pain. This stuff is ok. We use it in combination with Gerber, or Kirkland; as it does give her some discomfort, but not as much as the cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Nobody wants their product to arrive like this, especially something as important as their infants food.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Buyer aware of prices
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good til we caught Amazon raised the price silently. My husband was about to subscribe another package and noticed it, he was mad and unsubscribed.
customer_reviews.author: LTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Best formula I have tried
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son was introduced to a different formula and very quickly we changed to Enfamil Newborn. He went from fussy and unhappy to a content baby. It was night and day. With my youngest son, we started with Enfamil and we are sticking to it. Over 4 years now in contact with the brand and their line of products, I have no complaints and my kids have always been happy with their feedings and have healthy development.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves the stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it myself but my daughter sure seems to like it. Sometimes it's the only thing that will make her stop crying. She's gained 10lbs in 4 months and her doctor agrees with my unbiased assessment that "she's perfect" so it must be doing something right.
customer_reviews.author: J. Horner

customer_reviews.title: Enfamil PREMIUM Infant
customer_reviews.text: Convenient to purchase on amazon and have it shipped to the house. My baby did not show any signs of dislike or difference from amazon bought compared to store bought enfamil formula. The only gripe i have is that sometimes when the package is delivered and one is not home, they leave it at the door under the hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: G.N

customer_reviews.title: The two nights my son was back on Enfamil he had terrible gas, which was and still is very uncommon ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched formulas, then went back to Enfamil when I ran out of the other. The two nights my son was back on Enfamil he had terrible gas, which was and still is very uncommon for him. I stopped the Enfamil and the gas stopped, too.
customer_reviews.author: dmoutsop

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only formula our baby can tolerate. Even the sensitive-stomach Similac formula makes her throw up. We love Enfamil!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for infant if you don’t have enough money to buy the enspire.
customer_reviews.author: Chantiyana Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good deal and in perfect condition in side a and out
customer_reviews.author: Samantha (real review)

customer_reviews.title: Decent price, product as expected
customer_reviews.text: The price isn't as cheap as a particular wholesaler who sells this in 3 packs for the same price. But I can't find a per oz price similar anywhere else. Product is packaged as expected and I'm a fan of enfamil. For no particular purpose. And yes I know "all formulas are created equal", I just prefer enfamil.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Formula
customer_reviews.text: We used this formula for several months after breastfeeding and pumping just wasn't enough for our daughter. We tried Similac, but that seemed to upset her tummy and give her gas. Didn't have any problems with Enfamil, and was cheaper to buy through Amazon since we had Prime for free quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Comes with two packs of formula I had this bought for me before from the store but u can't beat the price considering formula is so expensive buying two separately would be like $50
customer_reviews.author: K. Danielle Perez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Used this for both my girls. I feel it’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sarena

customer_reviews.title: ... believe buying in bulk on the subscription is the best way to go
customer_reviews.text: I truly believe buying in bulk on the subscription is the best way to go! Save your time and money, have this product sent to your door. We liked Enfamil for our son, but he was an easy eater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is just very expensive had to move to a store brand
customer_reviews.author: Zarr

customer_reviews.title: MONEY SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is such a money saver compared to buying the formula that comes in the tub. Glad i found this, this is the only formula i buy now. And it mixes way better the enfamil premium newborn. 1cent cheaper then TARGET but no taxes here, so its great!!
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Best value is in largest box
customer_reviews.text: Best value is getting the biggest box for $135, it is a better deal. Just spend the money now you know your baby will need more formula soon so buy in bulk
customer_reviews.author: Rain City

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper price than walmart for same product
customer_reviews.text: Same enfamil infant milk but by buying online, we can save money for the sales tax. The milk itself is good. My baby could gain higher weight by consuming it. She likes the taste so much
customer_reviews.author: Just Lily

customer_reviews.title: Save more with costco
customer_reviews.text: We have twins and loved enfamil, but its vwry expensive. Found costcos brand is 100% identical in ingrediants texture color smell and taste. 40oz can is 17 bucks! Even the scoop is the same
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: great as usual
customer_reviews.text: great product and save some bucks but prices are same as retail store. Nothing special to buy online.
customer_reviews.author: Farhan B

customer_reviews.title: Good formula
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. No issues for my baby (or her older brother when he used it 6 years ago). But geez formula is expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great formula at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes this brands, and our pediatrician approved. She does r have any issues with gas or spitting up. If you use subscribe and save and amazon mom it is a far better price than you will find anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: S Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but my baby became VERY gaseous.
customer_reviews.text: My two month old has been on Enfamil since leaving the hospital. It worked great until a few weeks ago, when I noticed that he had developed quite a bit of gas and was increasingly fussy. We tried adding gripe water and other supplements to the formula, but that didn't work. We switched him to Enfamil Gentlease and everything has been much better. No need for the supplements!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kirby

product_meta.title: Enfamil PREMIUM Non-GMO Infant Formula - Powder Refill Box, 33.2 oz
product_meta.description: Powder refills. Reusable tub sold separately. Over 49% more (vs. our 22.2 oz. tub).
